Home.who-description: We are a student club from University of Bras√≠lia, Brazil, focused on education, development and research on Bitcoin. We have members from different courses; any student can become a member.
Home.what-description: We focus on spreading technical and practical knowledge about Bitcoin, through workshops and meetings. From creating your first wallet, until open-source contributions.
Home.how: How can I become a member?
Home.how-description: Any student can become a member. Showing interest and participating in meetings and workshops in enough. No prior knowledge is necessary.
Home.when-description: We meet up every friday, at 15:00 UTC-3, on the electrical engineering building auditorium. You don't need to be a member to attend.
Home.github-description: Workshops and projects are kept in our GitHub organization.
Home.nostr-description: Nostr, or Notes and Other Stuff Transmitted by Relays, is a new protocol for decentralized social media. You can find us by searching for npub105tr46lgr3zlz68sjyk4026y0ynd7uckzys0gk7jhpep54w4s50qzdv8xy on any Nostr client.

Resources.title: Resources
Resources.description: Resources and infrastructure offered to our members.
